description: Remodelling of existing second floor extension [Listed Building Consent application Ref P2014/0866/LBC also submitted]
decision_conditions:
To assist applicants the Local Planning Authority has produced policies and written guidance, all of which is available on the Councilâ€™s website. 

A pre-planning application advice service is also offered and encouraged.

No pre-application discussions were entered into. On receipt, the scheme did not comply with policy or guidance. The LPA acted in a proactive manner offering suggested improvements to the scheme to secure compliance with policies and written guidance which were not adopted by the applicant during the application stage.

The LPA delivered the decision in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the NPPF.

The LPA invites the applicant to enter into a collaborative pre-planning application discussion process to assist in the preparation of a new planning application.
